author: Okogba
title: We’ve not received copy of media bill —Imo Assembly

organizations.name: imo state house of assembly committee on information

text:
Home » News » We’ve not received copy of media bill —Imo Assembly We’ve not received copy of media bill —Imo Assembly On 3:47 am In News by Okogba Comments 
By Chinonso Alozie 
Owerri —The Imo State House of Assembly Committee on Information, yesterday, said it had not received a copy of the controversial media bill. 
Speaking to Vanguard , Chairman of the committee, Mr. Kennedy Ibeh, denied that the committee was planning to redefine, repackage and reintroduce the bill to the floor of the House. 
He said: “As I speak, I have asked the clerk of the House to send me a copy of the bill. I am yet to receive a copy of the bill. We are yet to receive a copy of the bill.”
